faqs.question: Which is better for fast gameplay?
faqs.answer: Clash Royale is better because it offers 2–3 minute real-time battles.

faqs.question: Which game is better for long-term progression?
faqs.answer: Clash of Clans offers deeper base-building and long-term village growth.

faqs.question: Are both games free to play?
faqs.answer: Yes, both are free with optional purchases that speed up progression.

faqs.question: Which game has more strategy?
faqs.answer: Both are strategic, but CoC focuses on planning & building, while CR focuses on real-time tactics.
